Welcome back, Jer! It wasn't the same without ya.

::Autofire::

Autofire sees Tantrum get blown away, growling and firing two 
missiles at Element's back. He opens his comm-link to ask Tantrum his 
condition, but only static rewarded him again. He looks around, 
seeing that the Decepticons wern't faring well. Megatron hadn't said 
that they should destroy the Maximals, just attack and not lost 
troops. Soon, he knew that it would be time to go back to base.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., gestalt_menasor@y... wrote:
> OOC: Okay, now i'm back for good. Jeremiah that is.
> Sorry Jen, I thought it was Element, but let's just continue, but 
it 
> will be hard to squash him into the ground with your foot when he's 
> flying :)
> 
> 
> BIC:
> 
> Tantrum franticly dove out of the way to avoid the missile, but 
since 
> they were mentally guided, one of them hit, setting off the other, 
in 
> a large explosion, sending Tantrum flying miles away, landing him 
near 
> G1 Rampage. He looked up at him through pained eyes, and a furious 
> snort. The damage he had taken from Lavatrons kick finally caught 
up 
> with him, and his chest armor was ripped and burnt thanks to the 
> carefully placed missile, "Ghhnn, let'sss get ...." his computer 
> finished the sentence for him. "Unit Tantrum seriously damaged, 
return 
> to base" it hummed. Tantrum went limp.
